00064 class PQXX_LIBEXPORT Cursor
00065 {
00066 public:
00067   // TODO: Split Cursor into different levels of intelligence
00068   // TODO: Forward-only cursors
00069   // TODO: Iterator interface (random-access==absolute)
00070   typedef result::size_type size_type;
00071 
00072   enum pos { pos_unknown = -1, pos_start = 0 };
00073 
00075   struct PQXX_LIBEXPORT unknown_position : PGSTD::runtime_error
00076   {
00077     unknown_position(const PGSTD::string &cursorname) :
00078       PGSTD::runtime_error("Position for cursor '" + cursorname + "' "
00079                            "is unknown") 
00080     {
00081     }
00082   };
00083 
00084   // TODO: Allow usage of SCROLL ("DECLARE foo SCROLL CURSOR FOR ...")
00086   /** 
00087    * @param T is the transaction that this cursor lives in.
00088    * @param Query defines a data set that the cursor should traverse.
00089    * @param BaseName optional name for the cursor, must begin with a letter 
00090    * and contain letters and digits only.  
00091    * @param Count the stride of the cursor, ie. the number of rows fetched at a
00092    * time.  This defaults to 1.
00093    */
00094   template<typename TRANSACTION> 
00095     Cursor(TRANSACTION &T,
00096            const char Query[], 
00097            const PGSTD::string &BaseName="cur",
00098            size_type Count=NEXT()) :                                    //[t3]
00099       m_Trans(T),
00100       m_Name(),
00101       m_Count(Count),
00102       m_Done(false),
00103       m_Pos(pos_start),
00104       m_Size(pos_unknown)
00105   {
00106     // Trigger build error if T has insufficient isolation level
00107     error_permitted_isolation_level(typename TRANSACTION::isolation_tag());
00108     init(BaseName, Query);
00109   }
00110 
00112 
00142   template<typename TRANSACTION>
00143     Cursor(TRANSACTION &T,
00144            const result::field &Name,
00145            size_type Count=NEXT()) :                                    //[t45]
00146       m_Trans(T),
00147       m_Name(Name.c_str()),
00148       m_Count(Count),
00149       m_Done(false),
00150       m_Pos(pos_unknown),
00151       m_Size(pos_unknown)
00152   {
00153     // Trigger build error if T has insufficient isolation level
00154     error_permitted_isolation_level(typename TRANSACTION::isolation_tag());
00155   }
00156 
00158   size_type SetCount(size_type);                                        //[t19]
00159 
00161 
00170   result Fetch(size_type Count);                                        //[t19]
00171 
00173 
00181   size_type Move(size_type Count);                                      //[t42]
00182 
00183   void MoveTo(size_type);                                               //[t44]
00184 
00186 
00190   static size_type ALL() throw ()                                       //[t3]
00191         { return PGSTD::numeric_limits<result::size_type>::max(); }
00192 
00194   static size_type NEXT() throw () { return 1; }                        //[t19]
00195 
00197   static size_type PRIOR() throw () { return -1; }                      //[t19]
00198 
00201 
00205   static size_type BACKWARD_ALL() throw ()                              //[t19]
00206         { return PGSTD::numeric_limits<result::size_type>::min() + 1; }
00207 
00209 
00216   Cursor &operator>>(result &);                                         //[t3]
00217 
00219   operator bool() const throw () { return !m_Done; }                    //[t3]
00221   bool operator!() const throw () { return m_Done; }                    //[t3]
00222 
00224   Cursor &operator+=(size_type N) { Move(N); return *this;}             //[t19]
00226   Cursor &operator-=(size_type N) { Move(-N); return *this;}            //[t19]
00227 
00229 
00240   size_type size() const throw () { return m_Size; }                    //[t44]
00241 
00243 
00250   size_type Pos() const throw (unknown_position)                        //[t43]
00251   { if (m_Pos==pos_unknown) throw unknown_position(m_Name); return m_Pos; }
00252 
00253 
00254 private:
00255   static PGSTD::string OffsetString(size_type);
00256   void init(const PGSTD::string &BaseName, const char Query[]);
00257   PGSTD::string MakeFetchCmd(size_type) const;
00258   size_type NormalizedMove(size_type Intended, size_type Actual);
00259 
00261 
00265   template<typename ISOLATIONTAG> 
00266     static inline void error_permitted_isolation_level(ISOLATIONTAG) throw();
00267 
00268   transaction_base &m_Trans;
00269   PGSTD::string m_Name;
00270   size_type m_Count;
00271   bool m_Done;
00272   size_type m_Pos;
00273   size_type m_Size;
00274 
00275   // Not allowed:
00276   Cursor(const Cursor &);
00277   Cursor &operator=(const Cursor &);
00278 };
